title: Records prima facie evidence
context: ยง11-96 Records prima facie evidence. Every record made pursuant to law by a board of registration of voters, or the precinct officials, shall be a prima facie evidence of the facts therein set forth, and shall be received as such in any court or tribunal in which the same is offered in evidence. [L 1970, c 26, pt of ยง2; am L 1973, c 217, ยง1(cc)]
